keyword: calories in chick fil a 12 count nuggets
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A 12 Count Nuggets
meta_description: Learn calories in chick fil a 12 count nuggets: 360 kcal total, with 29g protein, full macro breakdown, sodium details, and healthy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Breaded chicken breast nuggets, pressure-cooked in peanut oil; based on official Chick-fil-A nutrition for standard 12-count serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact portion, custom orders, and recipe changes. Always check Chick-fil-A's official app or site for current values.

quick_answer.text: Chick-fil-A 12 count nuggets provide 360 kcal, 29 g protein, and 17 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one Honey Roasted BBQ Sauce packet

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A 12 count nuggets?
How much protein is in 12 Chick-fil-A nuggets?
What is the fat content in Chick-fil-A 12 count nuggets?
faqs.a: 17 grams total fat, including 3 grams saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a 12 count Chick-fil-A nuggets?
Are there lower-calorie options for Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: Yes, grilled 12 count nuggets have 200 calories versus 360 for fried.
